mdRecord.dcterms:title: Farmington
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnston, Frances Benjamin, 1864-1952
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Interior, living room. Location: Charlottesville vicinity. Dwelling built for Francis Jerdone ca. 1760. House and property sold to George Divers 1785. Octagonal wing designed by Jefferson 1802, completed after 1852. House expanded and property adaptively reused as country club, 1927-present. Albemarle County, Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Carnegie Survey of the Architecture of the South
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Historic buildings--Virginia

Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
